questions.question: To what extent is your organization familiar with Generative AI on AWS?
questions.description: Assess your team's understanding of AWS services for generative AI, such as Amazon Bedrock, Amazon SageMaker, and their potential applications.

responses.text: We are just beginning to explore the capabilities of Generative AI on AWS and have minimal familiarity.
We have some theoretical knowledge of AWS Generative AI services but limited practical experience.
We have actively participated in AWS workshops and have a good conceptual understanding of services like Amazon Bedrock. [6, 35]
We have hands-on experience with a few AWS Generative AI services and have built proof-of-concept applications.
We have extensive experience and have deployed scalable Generative AI solutions on AWS, leveraging a wide range of services. [15]

responses.text: We have not yet researched industry-specific applications of Generative AI on AWS.

We are actively developing and deploying industry-specific Generative AI solutions on AWS, driving innovation and competitive advantage. [24]

questions.question: How well does your leadership understand the value of leveraging Generative AI on AWS?

responses.text: Our leadership has a limited understanding of the business value of Generative AI on AWS.

Leadership is actively championing the use of Generative AI on AWS and has allocated resources for initial projects.
Our leadership has a deep understanding of the strategic value and has integrated Generative AI on AWS into our core business strategy.

questions.question: How committed is your leadership to adopting Generative AI solutions on AWS?

responses.text: There is minimal commitment from leadership for adopting Generative AI on AWS at this time.
Leadership is open to exploring Generative AI on AWS but has not yet made a firm commitment.
Leadership has expressed a strong interest and is encouraging teams to experiment with AWS Generative AI services.
Leadership has committed to specific Generative AI initiatives on AWS and has allocated a dedicated budget. [41]
Leadership is fully committed, viewing Generative AI on AWS as a strategic imperative and is investing significantly in its adoption.

questions.question: How clear is your organization's vision or strategy for how Generative AI on AWS can support your business objectives?

responses.text: We do not have a defined vision or strategy for Generative AI on AWS.

We have a developing strategy that outlines how AWS Generative AI can support key business objectives. [16]
We have a well-defined strategy with clear business objectives and a roadmap for implementing Generative AI solutions on AWS. [18]
Our Generative AI strategy on AWS is fully integrated with our overall business strategy and is actively driving measurable results.
